azurerm_vpn_gateway.description: Manages a VPN Gateway within a Virtual Hub.

name.description: The Name which should be used for this VPN Gateway. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The Name of the Resource Group in which this VPN Gateway should be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: The Azure location where this VPN Gateway should be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

virtual_hub_id.description: The ID of the Virtual Hub within which this VPN Gateway should be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

scale_unit.description: The Scale Unit for this VPN Gateway. Defaults to `1`.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the VPN Gateway.

asn.description: The ASN of the BGP Speaker. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

peer_weight.description: The weight added to Routes learned from this BGP Speaker. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

id.description: The ID of the VPN Gateway.

bgp_peering_address.description: The Address which should be used for the BGP Peering.

create.description: Used when creating the VPN Gateway.

update.description: Used when updating the VPN Gateway.

read.description: Used when retrieving the VPN Gateway.

delete.description: Used when deleting the VPN Gateway.
